          <title>
            <string language="en-US">The Visitation: Mary meets St. Elisabeth</string>
            <string language="de-DE">Heimsuchung Mariens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Visitation : Rue Elisabeth de 
rassemblements de Mary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Visitation: St. Elisabeth das reuniões 
de Mary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Visitation: St Elisabeth di raduni della

            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Visitation: Θ*Μαρυ συναντά το ST 
Elisabeth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Visitation: St. Elisabeth de las 
reuniones de Maria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">Medieval and early modern visual culture: a digitized piece of art.<br>Artist:  unknown<br>Date: Around the turn of the 15th to the 16th century<br>Where to find: Albions - Alto Adige - Italy</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Culture visuelle moderne médiévale et tôt : 
un morceau numérisé d'art.&lt;br&gt;Artist : unknown&lt;br&gt;Date :
Autour du tour du 15ème au 16ème century&lt;br&gt;Where à trouver :
Albions - Alto Adige - Italie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultura visual moderna medieval e adiantada: 
uma parte digitada de art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: unknown&lt;br&gt;Date: 
Em torno da volta do 1ä ao 1õ century&lt;br&gt;Where a encontrar: 
Albions - Alto Adige - Italy</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coltura visiva moderna medioevale ed in anticipo:
una parte data valori numerici a di art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: 
unknown&lt;br&gt;Date: Intorno alla girata del quindicesima - il
sedicesimo century&lt;br&gt;Where da trovare: Albions - Negativo per 
la stampa di cartamoneta Adige - Italia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεσαιωνικός και πρόωρος σύγχρονος οπτικός πολιτισμός:
ένα μεταλλαγμένο κομμάτι art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: unknown&lt;br&gt;Date: Γύρω από τη στροφή του 15$ου στο 16$ο 
century&lt;br&gt;Where για να βρεί: Albions - Alto Adige
- Ιταλία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cultura visual moderna medieval y temprana: 
un pedazo digitalizado de art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: unknown&lt;br&gt;Date:
Alrededor de la vuelta del décimo quinta a el décimosexto 
century&lt;br&gt;Where a encontrar: Albions - Alto Adige - Italia</string>
          </description>
